main event: An Assistant Upland Game Biologist observed a bluish and rose colored delta shaped flying object near Nampa, Idaho on July 30, 1949.
interesting points: The object appeared to loop suddenly and traveled at an estimated speed of over 800 mph,The observer reported no sound associated with the object,The object was described as having a metallic appearance with colors never seen before,The sighting lasted only a few seconds,The object faded from sight as if turning on edge.
